mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS speakerId, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_url FROM event_speaker s WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id AS speakerId, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.title, s.background, s.description, s.banner_url FROM event_speaker s WHERE s.first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') OR s.last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY s.update_time DESC
SELECT title, first_name AS firstName, last_name AS lastName, background, description, banner_url FROM event_speaker s JOIN event_speaker_relation r ORDER BY s.id ASC
